sx.blah.discord.handle.obj

Interface IRole

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Role

    public interface IRole
    Represents a role.

    • Method Summary

      Gets the position of the role, the higher the number the higher priority it has on sorting.

      Checks whether the role is managed by an external plugin like twitch.

    • Method Detail

      • getPosition

        int getPosition()
        Gets the position of the role, the higher the number the higher priority it has on sorting. @everyone is always -1
        Returns:
        The position.

      • getPermissions

        EnumSet<Permissions> getPermissions()
        Gets the position the role allows.
        Returns:
        The set of enabled permissions.

      • getName

        String getName()
        Gets the name of the role.
        Returns:
        The name.

      • isManaged

        boolean isManaged()
        Checks whether the role is managed by an external plugin like twitch.
        Returns:
        True if managed, false if otherwise.

      • getID

        String getID()
        Gets the unique id of the role.
        Returns:
        The role id.

      • isHoisted

        boolean isHoisted()
        Gets whether the role is hoistedâ€“meaning that it is displayed separately from the @everyone role.
        Returns:
        True if hoisted, false if otherwise.

      • getColor

        Color getColor()
        Gets the color for this role.
        Returns:
        The color.

      • getGuild

        Returns:

      • edit

        void edit(Optional<Color> color,
          Optional<Boolean> hoist,
          Optional<String> name,
          Optional<EnumSet<Permissions>> permissions)
   throws MissingPermissionsException,
          HTTP429Exception,
          DiscordException
        Edits this role.
        Parameters:
        color - The new color for the role.
        hoist - Whether the role should now be hoisted.
        name - The new name for the role.
        permissions - The new permissions for the role.
        Throws:
        MissingPermissionsException
        HTTP429Exception
        DiscordException
